name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Google Maps Buttons in Google Search
name.de: Google Maps Buttons in der Google Suche

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Shows Google Maps links in your search results & makes maps clickable. Designed for EU residents after the Digital Markets Act.
short.de: Zeigt direkte Links zu Google Maps in den Suchergebnissen an und macht eingebettete Karten anklickbar. Entwickelt für EU-Bürger…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In today's digital world, efficiency is crucial, especially when navigating between tools. The EU's Digital Markets Act (DMA) has complicated the once-simple task of moving from Google Search to Maps. This extension solves this by restoring seamless integration.

Why Choose This Extension?

Key Frustrations Addressed:
	1.	Missing Direct Links: The extension adds a Google Maps link back to the navigation bar on Google Search pages, eliminating the need to manually open Maps and re-enter queries.
	2.	Static Map Images: It makes map previews clickable again, allowing users to quickly access detailed maps and directions.

Features
	•	Seamless Integration: Automatically adds a Maps link to Google Search pages for one-click access.
	•	Clickable Map Previews: Restores the ability to click on map images in search results.
	•	Intuitive Design: Incorporates search queries into the Maps URL and works automatically without complex setup.
	•	Compliance: Adheres to EU regulations, being an external extension installed manually.

Benefits
	•	Enhanced Productivity: Saves time by removing extra navigation steps.
	•	Improved User Experience: Restores lost functionalities for a smoother interaction with Google services.
	•	Accessibility: Designed for all users, regardless of technical skill.

Use Cases
	•	Travel Planning: Quick access to route planning from search results.
	•	Business Exploration: Efficient map queries for faster decision-making.
	•	Everyday Navigation: Simplifies commuting and exploring local amenities.

Getting Started
	1.	Installation: Available on the Chrome Web Store; simply click “Add to Chrome.”
	2.	Set and Forget: Starts working immediately without further setup.
	3.	Updates and Support: Regularly updated for compatibility and compliance, with support available as needed.
